data.description: A string bigwig file path to be plotted, or a dataframe in BED format, or a\link[GenomicRanges]{GRanges} object with metadata column \code{score}

binSize.description: A numeric specifying the length of each databin in basepairs

binCap.description: A logical value indicating whether the function willlimit the number of data bins to 8,000

negData.description: A logical value indicating whether the provided data hasnegative scores

chrom.description: A string specifying the chromosome of region to be plotted

chromstart.description: An integer start position on chromosome to be plotted

chromend.description: An integer end position on chromosome to be plotted

assembly.description: A string specifying the default genome assembly or a\link[plotgardener]{assembly} object

linecolor.description: A character value or vector of length 2 specifying theline color(s) outlining the signal track(s)

fill.description: A character value or vector of length 2 specifyingthe fill color(s) of the signal track(s)

ymax.description: A numeric specifying the fraction of the max y-valueto set as the height of the plot

range.description: A numeric vector of length 2 specifying the y-rangeof data to plot (c(min, max))

scale.description: A logical value indicating whether to include a datascale label in the top left corner of the plot

label.description: An optional character value to conveniently add a text labelto the plot

bg.description: A character value indicating background color

baseline.description: A logical value indicating whether to include abaseline along the x-axis

orientation.description: A string specifying signal track orientation

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying signal plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b"combined with a numeric value specifying signal plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying signal plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying signal plot height

just.description: A string specifying the justification of signal plot relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are only given asnumerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics output should beproduced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
